title: About
storyStart: My coding journey started in high school far in the early 2000's and my web development adventure began in 2020, as I decided to redirect my professional career.

storyCurrent.intro: Mostly I freelance, build my own projects, or collaborate, for exemple together with
storyCurrent.for: data we developed an AI-based prototype for monitoring carbon concentrations trends in soils and vegetation, leading to

aboutMe.first: I'm a confident and capable individual, enjoy and profit from team work, curious by nature, and perpetually eager and work on improving my skills one problem at a time.
aboutMe.second: I love diving, camping and traveling in the outdoor, will never say no for a cup of coffee under a tree with some nice view, building and repairing stuff, reading, good music and films, and on top of all I love my wife and daughters.
